thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: Ron Larson

author: Ron Larson
title: Ron Larson
text:
We used OFX to move the funds from a house sale in Australia to the US for our purchase here. They were so easy to work with. We managed to get it moved over in 4 days, spanning a weekend too! And I think we saved about $10k USD by using OFX instead of going with a wire like our bank's recommended.
Even though this was a one-off, small potatoes (less than $200K USD), they treated is well and professionally.
